content:
TAIWAN HIGHWAY BUREAU ROAD CONSTRUCTION TEAM 7 PARK ROAD, TAIPEI, TAIWAN TEL. 22692 33001
IN YOUR REPLY PLEASE REFER TO FILE NO.
DATE July 16, 1962
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Dear Mr. Chang:
We have reviewed the Excess property list from your office and found that some of them are very useful for us.
140.112.213.82 Nine copies of needed items are enclosed here with, please contact AID to take necessary action on P/sp.
Your truly
E. H. Fang
E, H. Fang Chief, R. C. T. T. H. B.
國史饭 Academia Historica
133
